---
title: "View documentation templates"
date: last-modified
---

Learn how to view the structure and configuration of existing documentation templates on the {{< var validmind.platform >}}. 

::: {.prereq}

## {{< fa check >}} Prerequisites

- [ ] {{< var link.login >}}
- [ ] You are a `Customer Admin` or assigned another role with sufficient permissions to perform the tasks in this guide.[^1] 

:::

## Steps

1. In the left sidebar, click **{{< fa gear >}} Settings** and then **Templates**.

2. Click on one of the available templates. 

   In the page that opens, you can view information about the template, such as: 

   - Name and description of the template
   - Version of the templates
   - Sections in the template and how they are structured
   - Guidelines associated with each section 
   - Metrics from the {{< var vm.developer >}} that feed into the template
